sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import SlimGridMotion from '../components/SlimGridMotion'; const ProjectingSigns: React.FC = () => { const headingRef = useRef(null); const contentRef = useRef(null); const ctaRef = useRef(null); // Projecting signs images for SlimGridMotion const projectingImages = Array.from({ length: 21 }, (_, index) => { const imageNum = (index % 4) + 1; return `/projecting-signs/projecting${imageNum}.jpg`; }); useEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline({ defaults: { ease: 'power3.out' } }); tl.fromTo( headingRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 40 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 1, delay: 0.3 } ) .fromTo( contentRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 30 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.9 }, '-=0.6' ) .fromTo( ctaRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.8 }, '-=0.4' ); }, []); const steps = [ { number: '1', title: 'Get a FREE quote', description: 'Mix & match one of our bracket styles with one of our standard panel sizes, then add customisation.', }, { number: '2', title: 'Design Stage', description: 'Send your artwork for a proof, or our design team will create visuals of how your projecting sign could look on your premises.', }, { number: '3', title: 'Approve your order', description: 'After approval, we will get it into production (5-10 working days). You can also book our installation team to fit your projecting sign.', }, { number: '4', title: 'Order up!', description: 'Collect from Kidderminster or we can arrange posting (Delivery from ¬£10). Booked installers? Our team will meet you on site.', } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* SlimGridMotion Background */}
{/* Dark Overlay */}
{/* Top Blur for Header */}
{/* Content */}

Attract customers
from all angles

Our projecting signs come in a range of styles, shapes and sizes. Mix & match your bracket and panel, then chat to our design team.

How It Works Get FREE Quote
{/* Bottom Vignette */}
{/* How It Works Section */}

How's it work?

{steps.map((step, index) => (
{step.number}

{step.title}

{step.description}

))}
{/* Custom Made Section */}

Custom made for you

All of our projecting signs can be made to your exact specifications and are manufactured using the best materials and then finished to a very high standard.

Projecting signs are designed primarily for outdoor usage and are robustly built to withstand all weathers.

{[ 'Mix & match brackets and panels', 'Manufactured to exact specifications', 'Weather-resistant construction', 'Professional installation available' ].map((point, idx) => (

{point}

))}

{/* Contact CTA */}

Ready to stand out?

Get a free quote for your custom projecting sign

Get FREE Quote Call 01562 227 117
); }; export default ProjectingSigns;
